text: Lucie Schlimé (born 19 September 2003) is a Luxembourger footballer who plays as a goalkeeper for Dames Ligue 1 club FC CeBra 01 and the Luxembourg women's national team. ==International career== Schlimé made her senior debut for Luxembourg on 9 November 2019 during a 0–5 friendly loss to Kosovo. ==References== Category:2003 births Category:Living people Category:Women's association football goalkeepers Category:Luxembourgian women's footballers Category:Luxembourg women's international footballers
title: Lucie Schlimé
